name: Push-Ups
description: Your hands are more than shoulder width apart, not too much in front or too far back. When you move down there is an inhale, when you move up there is an exhale.

name: Triceps- Push-Ups
description: Your hands are in the middle under your chest, not too much in front or too much behind. When you move down, you inhale, when you move up, you exhale.

name: Incline Push-Ups
description: Your hands should be placed on a raised surface, not too far in front or too far behind. When moving down, inhale, when moving up, exhale.

name: Decline Push-Ups
description: Your hands should be placed on a lowered surface, not too far in front or too far behind. When moving down, inhale, when moving up, exhale.

name: Squats
description: You must straddle shoulder width apart and then go into a squat so that you don't lift your heels off the ground.

name: Sumo squats
description: You must straddle a width greater than the width of your shoulders and then perform a squat while keeping your heels on the ground.

name: High Knees
description: Stand with your feet hip-width apart. Lift up your left knee to your chest then Switch to lift your right knee to your chest. Continue the movement, alternating legs and moving at a sprinting or running pace.

name: Jump Squats
description: Stand again on more than your shoulder width, go into a squat and jump dynamically while moving up.

name: Russian Twist
description: Sit upright on the floor with legs slightly bent and turn the upper torso to the left and then to the right.

name: Crunches
description: The crunches begins lying on your back with your legs bent at the knees. The torso bent so that the shoulders are close to the pelvis.

name: Scizzors
description: Scissors -lying on your back, raising both legs off of the ground, then criss-crossing one over the other.

name: Bicycle Crunches
description: You lie on your back and use your legs to simulate cycling.
